text: A vibrant green frog wearing a pair of round, tinted swimming goggles. The frog Ffinds itself in a unique, human-like situation where it is enjoying a cup of hot coffee while reading a newspaper in a cozy, rustic oak-wood kitchen. It is sitting on a beautifully handmade, wooden chair upholstered with floral patterned fabric. The room is filled with warm ambient light from a vintage pendant lamp hanging above, and the smell of freshly baked cookies wafts in the air.
